document.full_text: nbc will attempt to revive its tv schedule by stuffing it with a dozen new shows next season, building a new block of comedy and rolling out a high-profile musical drama from producer steven spielberg.
document.title: nbc overhauls tv schedule with 12 new scripted shows
lines_and_colors: nbc will attempt to revive its tv schedule by stuffing it with a dozen new shows next season, building a new block of comedy and rolling out a high-profile musical drama from producer steven spielberg.
